scan_column_type_check.description: Retrieving variables can be expensive if there are many of them. It should be avoided to use the variables object in scripted conditions which should be used to determine if the following script should be executed at all.
scan_column_type_check.name: CodeSanity - Variables in conditions
scan_column_type_check.resolution_details: If there is any logic that depends on the existence or specific values of variables it should be moved into the actual script block.
scan_column_type_check.short_description: Do not use variables in scripted conditions
